document.full_text: zimbabwe's president robert mugabe said the power-sharing government should end this year and elections held as soon as possible, suggesting polls could even be conducted in 2012, the herald newspaper said friday.
document.title: zimbabwe's mugabe suggests 2012 elections
lines_and_colors: zimbabwe's president robert mugabe said the power-sharing government should end this year and elections held as soon as possible, suggesting polls could even be conducted in 2012, the herald newspaper said friday.
